ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'
name: lightning-utilities

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "lightning-utilities" %}
{% set version = "0.15.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name.replace('-', '_') }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cdf12f530214a63dacefd713f180d1ecf5d165338101617b4742e8f22c032e24

build:
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 0
  noarch: python

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - packaging >=17.1
    - typing_extensions
    - setuptools

test:
  imports:
    - lightning_utilities
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}


about:
  home: https://github.com/Lightning-AI/utilities
  summary: PyTorch Lightning Sample project.
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - Borda
    - carmocca
    - Tobias-Fischer
